languages.text: "Мы — служители закона Бога-Императора, воплощенного в {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Лекс Империалис{/g}. Адептус Арбитес следят за соблюдением порядка в масштабах Империума и несут беспощадную кару нарушителям".

"We are servants of the God-Emperor's Law made manifest in the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g}. The Adeptus Arbites uphold order on the scale of the Imperium and bring merciless punishment to offenders."
languages.original_text: "Мы — служители закона Бога-Императора, воплощенного в {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Лекс Империалис{/g}. Адептус Арбитес следят за соблюдением порядка в масштабах Империума и несут беспощадную кару нарушителям".

traits.locale_text: "We are servants of the God-Emperor's law made manifest in the Lex Imperialis. The Adeptus Arbites uphold order on the scale of the Imperium and bring merciless punishment to offenders."

"We are servants of the God-Emperor's Law made manifest in the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g}. The Adeptus Arbites uphold order on the scale of the Imperium and bring merciless punishment to offenders."

languages.text: 「私たちは、{g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}レックス・インペリア{/g}において具現化された神帝陛下の法の僕です。高等裁定局は帝国規模で秩序を維持し、違反者には容赦なく裁きを下します」
languages.original_text: "We are servants of the God-Emperor's Law made manifest in the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g}. The Adeptus Arbites uphold order on the scale of the Imperium and bring merciless punishment to offenders."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちは、レックス・インペリアにおいて具現化された神帝陛下の法の僕です。高等裁定局は帝国規模で秩序を維持し、違反者には容赦なく裁きを下します」

languages.text: "Wir sind Diener des Gesetzes des Gottimperators, manifestiert im {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperia{/g}. Die Adeptus Arbites halten die Ordnung im Imperium aufrecht und bestrafen Missetäter gnadenlos."
languages.original_text: "We are servants of the God-Emperor's Law made manifest in the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g}. The Adeptus Arbites uphold order on the scale of the Imperium and bring merciless punishment to offenders."

traits.locale_text: "Wir sind Diener des Gesetzes des Gottimperators, manifestiert im {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperia{/g}. Die Adeptus Arbites halten die Ordnung im Imperium aufrecht und bestrafen Missetäter gnadenlos."

languages.text: « Nous sommes les serviteurs de la loi de l'Empereur-Dieu, la {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g}. L'Adeptus Arbites a pour mission de maintenir l'ordre dans tout l'Imperium et de châtier quiconque s'avise de la défier. »
languages.original_text: "We are servants of the God-Emperor's Law made manifest in the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g}. The Adeptus Arbites uphold order on the scale of the Imperium and bring merciless punishment to offenders."

traits.locale_text: « Nous sommes les serviteurs de la loi de l'Empereur-Dieu, la {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g}. L'Adeptus Arbites a pour mission de maintenir l'ordre dans tout l'Imperium et de châtier quiconque s'avise de la défier. »

languages.text: «Somos siervos de la ley del Dios Emperador, encarnada en la {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g}. El Adeptus Arbites mantiene el orden en todo el Imperium y castiga sin piedad a los infractores».
languages.original_text: "We are servants of the God-Emperor's Law made manifest in the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g}. The Adeptus Arbites uphold order on the scale of the Imperium and bring merciless punishment to offenders."

traits.locale_text: «Somos siervos de la ley del Dios Emperador, encarnada en la {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g}. El Adeptus Arbites mantiene el orden en todo el Imperium y castiga sin piedad a los infractores».

languages.text: “我们是神皇的仆人，负责行使祂的律法，维护{g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}帝国法典{/g}的权威。法务部负责维持整个帝国的秩序，对违法分子施加无情的惩罚。”
languages.original_text: "We are servants of the God-Emperor's Law made manifest in the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g}. The Adeptus Arbites uphold order on the scale of the Imperium and bring merciless punishment to offenders."

traits.locale_text: “我们是神皇的仆人，负责行使祂的律法，维护{g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}帝国法典{/g}的权威。法务部负责维持整个帝国的秩序，对违法分子施加无情的惩罚。”

languages.text: "Bizler {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex İmperialis{/g}'te tezahür eden Tanrı İmparator'un Kanunu'nun hizmetkârlarıyız. Adeptus Arbites, İmparatorluk ölçeğinde düzeni korumakla ve suçlulara acımasız cezalar vermekle görevlidir."
languages.original_text: "We are servants of the God-Emperor's Law made manifest in the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g}. The Adeptus Arbites uphold order on the scale of the Imperium and bring merciless punishment to offenders."

traits.locale_text: "Bizler {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex İmperialis'te{/g} tezahür eden Tanrı İmparator'un Kanunu'nun hizmetkârlarıyız. Adeptus Arbites, İmparatorluk ölçeğinde düzeni korumakla ve suçlulara acımasız cezalar vermekle görevlidir."

languages.original_text: "We are servants of the God-Emperor's Law made manifest in the Lex Imperialis. The Adeptus Arbites uphold order on the scale of the Imperium and bring merciless punishment to offenders."
